abstract: The asset management firm brought back Paul A. McCulley to help reassure skeptical investors and bolster its intellectual credentials.
snippet: The asset management firm brought back Paul A. McCulley to help reassure skeptical investors and bolster its intellectual credentials.
lead_paragraph: Updated, 6:32 p.m. | Before he resigned as chief executive of Pimco, Mohamed A. El-Erian lent the asset management firm a measure of gravitas, opining frequently on the economic issues of the day.

headline.main: Pimco Rehires a Former Top Executive
headline.print_headline: Pimco Rehires a Former Top Executive
